text: Greg Burdine (May 1, 1959 â€“ December 13, 2020) was an American politician. He was a member of the Alabama House of Representatives, representing the 1st District from 2010 to 2014. Burdine was a member of the Democratic Party. Burdine was born in Florence, Alabama. Burdine died on December 13, 2020, in Florence, Alabama at age 61. ==References== Category:1959 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Members of the Alabama Legislature Category:Politicians from Alabama Category:People from Florence, Alabama Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians
title: Greg Burdine
